ing: 1 tablespoon spicy brown mustard, or more to taste
3/4 teaspoon ground cloves, or more to taste
des: "Made for Thanksgiving ham to take to mom's in 2014. Received lots of compliments! Used a cook's ham shank from MeijerÂ®. Adjust clove and ginger to taste. Pour glaze over cooked ham or after ham is sliced."
ins: Mix brown sugar, honey, brown mustard, cloves, and ginger together in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave until sugar is dissolved, 45 to 60 seconds.
